keyword: how many calories in a costco pizza
title: How Many Calories in a Costco Pizza?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a Costco pizza, including full nutrition breakdown per whole pizza, macros, and variations for food court style.
h1: How Many Calories in a Costco Pizza?
assumptions: Standard Costco food court cheese pizza, 16-inch, 12 slices, including crust, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese; no extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by exact recipe, size, toppings, and preparation at different locations. Check Costco's labels or app when available.

quick_answer.text: A whole Costco cheese pizza contains about 8400 calories and 360 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Thin crust variation (reduces dough per pizza)

faqs.q: How many calories in a Costco pizza slice?
faqs.a: About 700 kcal per slice for a standard 12-slice cheese pizza.

faqs.q: What are the macros for a whole Costco pizza?
faqs.a: â‰ˆ960 g carbs, 360 g protein, 360 g fat, with 60 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does Costco pizza have high sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 16,800 mg sodium for the whole pizza due to cheese and sauce.

faqs.q: How does pepperoni change calories in a Costco pizza?
faqs.a: Adds about 600 kcal total from the meat toppings.

faqs.q: Are these values for food court or take-and-bake Costco pizza?
faqs.a: Based on food court; take-and-bake may vary slightly by home baking method.
